comment: My htc wildfire sumtim gets freezed whn call comes. Da ph has trackball but is of no use to answer calls. Dis app helps me answering all calls even if da scrn is non responsive. Der are yet a lot of bugs to be fixed. Anyway its a saveour.

title: Good app
comment: Works as advertised. Doesn't mess with my GO Power Manager, or my Winamp remote app upon unlocking. However the screen seems to randomly choose a brightness, until I restarted my android.  Samsung Galaxy Prevail

title: CDrew HTC Incred 2
comment: No more face/nose dialing or hanging up so happy was about to through my phone to the curb ..

title: No more accidental ignores when ringing
comment: I carry my phone in my pocket and it's been a constant problem where I accidentally swipe "decline" on an incoming call.  This smartly solved the problem. with a button to answer overlaying the swipe.  Back button gives me access to the decline button.  Now, worst case, I accidentally answer the phone, but it takes two motions to decline.    Equally smart, the dev gave the option for a similar "Reject" button if that's your preference (or both by button instead of swipe.  I don't need the other features, so can't speak to them, but this solved a long recurring problem.  -Tom (on Casio Commando)

title: My Phone Is Usable Again!
comment: Finally! You've managed to stop my stupid Thunderbolt from hanging up on everyone the first time I answer the phone!

title: Awesome
comment: Works well for Sony xperia neo :-) thanks a lot . Just looked out for somethin like this

title: Love
comment: No more pressing random numbers with my cheek!

title: Doesn't work
comment: Gingerbread epic 4g galaxy S

title: great
comment: This app really serve what I need. I've been so annoyed to have to swipe the lock and then do the pattern lock everytime I want to use the phone from stand by. I want to disable the lock and do the pattern only. I can manually lock the screen by push the power button on my xperia mini pro. Now, everytime I turn on the display after stand by, I only need to do the pattern lock. Mission accomplished! :)

title: so far so good, but ...
comment: So far I love the bypass screen lock, seems to be great app. (Though I wish I could bypass sleep key on my LG Connect - so tiny I can barely find it each time!)  I am completely new to Android, though, and I don't understand why all of these apps ask for so much permission. This one says it can directly call phone numbers ... yikes! Can someone explain this to me or tell me why I *shouldn't* worry about  it? Don't want to have to delete app. Thx! It ain't easy bein' green ... :P

title: Works great on Fascinate w/ Froyo w/ glass unlock
comment: As others have reported here, the lock screen does come up for a split second before the regular ("non-lock"?) screen. And as others have reported, it doesn't work 100% and sometimes it takes a moment... IF you're using the puzzle unlock. Change it to the 'glass' unlock (Settings->Display->Unlock), though, and it works faster and MUCH more reliably. In fact, I haven't had it not work once since I changed it!

title: works perfectly on moto droid 1
comment: i was so thrilled to find a "lock-suppressor" that would NOT make my volume and camera buttons wake the phone up (with this app, only power will wake it up). perfect. does what it says, and no more butt-calling.

title: It Works?!
comment: I tried two other "No Lock" apps and both would stop working on an intermittent basis. While this one is disconcerting in that the lock screen shows for a second when the phone is turned on, it does unlock without any extra input from me. It works.
